text: Micropholis garciniifolia is a species of plant in the family Sapotaceae. It is endemic to Puerto Rico, where it is known as caimitillo verde. It is becoming rare due to habitat loss. ==References== garciniifolia Category:Near threatened plants Category:Plants described in 1891 Category:Endemic flora of Puerto Rico Category:Taxonomy articles created by Polbot
title: Micropholis garciniifolia
